Package com.irurueta.server.commons.image

This package contains utility classes for basic image manipulation, such as creating thumbnails or transcoding images into different formats.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildInfo
    Contains build data for this library.
    GPSCoordinates
    This class contains GPS coordinates of an image (latitude, longitude and altitude) expressed in degrees and meters respectively.
    ImageMetadata
    Specifies image metadata containing information such as image size, camera maker or model, or GPS coordinates where a picture was taken.
    ImageReader
    Class to read image metadata.
    ImageReaderResult
    Structure containing information about an image file that has been read using and ImageReader.
    ThumbnailCreator
    This class generates thumbnails of images.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Flash
    Enumerator indicating flash modes of EXIF data contained in an image file.
    ImageFormat
    Enumeration containing supported image formats.
    ImageOrientation
    Enumerator specified possible image orientations.
    LightSource
    Enumerator indicating light source used to take a picture.
    ThumbnailFormat
    Enumerator indicating supported thumbnail formats.
    Unit
    Enumerator indicating possible measure units to be used in EXIF data.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ImageException
    Base exception class for this package.
    InvalidImageException
    Raised when an image file is not valid, not supported or corrupted.
